page.title: 11Fashion
page.content: There are many different styles in this day and age.Mods, punks and casuals all have their own styles and images. Casual clothes are made to look good but are also made to be comfortable, such as baggy trousers and jumpers. Uniform is worn to our school.In the winter the young girls wear tunic dresses with jumpers or cardigans,and white shirts.The older girls wear green skirts,white shirts,a golden tie and white socks.The young boys wear shorts, grey socks, grey jumpers, white shirts and a golden tie.The older boys just wear long black trousers instead of shorts.Most wear casual clothes but others wear unfashionable clothes such as cords, shirts and trainers.Women tend to wear trousers now, and all in one jump suits Men enjoy comfortable baggy trousers and baggy jumpers.
